LanguageData.Planterbox.label: Planter Box
LanguageData.Planterbox.description: Crude box filled with soil, that allows you to grow anywhere. Fertility is reduced to 60%. Does not require power.
LanguageData.Planterbox_Blueprint.label: Planter Box (blueprint)
LanguageData.Planterbox_Frame.label: Planter Box (building)
LanguageData.Planterbox_Frame.description: Crude box filled with soil, that allows you to grow anywhere. Fertility is reduced to 60%. Does not require power.
LanguageData.ModularPlanterbox.label: Modular Planter Box
LanguageData.ModularPlanterbox.description: Crude box filled with soil, that allows you to grow anywhere. Fertility is reduced to 60%. Does not require power. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size.
LanguageData.ModularPlanterbox_Blueprint.label: Modular Planter Box (blueprint)
LanguageData.ModularPlanterbox_Frame.label: Modular Planter Box (building)
LanguageData.ModularPlanterbox_Frame.description: Crude box filled with soil, that allows you to grow anywhere. Fertility is reduced to 60%. Does not require power. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size.
LanguageData.ModularHydroponicsBasin.label: Modular Hydroponics Basin
LanguageData.ModularHydroponicsBasin.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut. Fertility is 220%.
LanguageData.ModularHydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: Modular Hydroponics Basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.ModularHydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: Modular Hydroponics Basin (building)
LanguageData.ModularHydroponicsBasin_Frame.descriptio: Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut. Fertility is 220%.
LanguageData.ADVHydroponicsBasin.label: Advanced hydroponics basin
LanguageData.ADVHydroponicsBasin.description: Grows plants more quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires more power to work then basic basin; plants will die if power is cut. Provides it's own light. Fertility is 300%.
LanguageData.ADVHydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: Advanced hydroponics basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.ADVHydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: Advanced hydroponics basin (building)
LanguageData.ADVHydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: Grows plants more quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires more power to work then basic basin; plants will die if power is cut. Provides it's own light. Fertility is 300%.
LanguageData.ADVModularHydroponicsBasin.label: Adv. Modular hydroponics basin
LanguageData.ADVModularHydroponicsBasin.description: Grows plants more quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires more power to work then basic basin; plants will die if power is cut. Provides it's own light. Fertility is 300%.
LanguageData.ADVModularHydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: Adv. Modular hydroponics basin (building)
LanguageData.ADVModularHydroponicsBasin_Frame.descrip: Grows plants more quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires more power to work then basic basin; plants will die if power is cut. Provides it's own light. Fertility is 300%.
LanguageData.ModularFlowerarea.label: Modular flower area
LanguageData.ModularFlowerarea.description: An area that allows you to grow flowers. Can only be placed on growable soil. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size.
LanguageData.ModularFlowerarea_Blueprint.label: Modular flower area (blueprint)
LanguageData.ModularFlowerarea_Frame.label: Modular flower area (building)
LanguageData.ModularFlowerarea_Frame.description: An area that allows you to grow flowers. Can only be placed on growable soil. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size.
LanguageData.VG_Flowerarea.label: Flower area 2x2
LanguageData.VG_Flowerarea.description: A 2x2 area that allows you to grow flowers. Can only be placed on growable soil.
LanguageData.VG_Flowerarea_Blueprint.label: Flower area 2x2 (blueprint)
LanguageData.VG_Flowerarea_Frame.label: Flower area 2x2 (building)
LanguageData.VG_Flowerarea_Frame.description: A 2x2 area that allows you to grow flowers. Can only be placed on growable soil.
LanguageData.FertilizerMachine.label: fertilizer machine
LanguageData.FertilizerMachine.description: Use plants to produce fertilizer. Requires to install near hopper!
LanguageData.FertilizerMachine_Blueprint.label: fertilizer machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.FertilizerMachine_Frame.label: fertilizer machine (building)
LanguageData.FertilizerMachine_Frame.description: Use plants to produce fertilizer. Requires to install near hopper!
LanguageData.VG_Composterbox.label: Composter Box
LanguageData.VG_Composterbox.description: Crude box filled with soil and plant matter that allows the "growth" of fertilizer
LanguageData.VG_Composterbox_Blueprint.label: Composter Box (blueprint)
LanguageData.VG_Composterbox_Blueprint_Install.label: Composter Box (blueprint)
LanguageData.VG_Composterbox_Frame.label: Composter Box (building)
LanguageData.VG_Composterbox_Frame.description: Crude box filled with soil and plant matter that allows the "growth" of fertilizer
